articles.description: South Tyneside’s hospital trust has announced there have been no deaths relating to coronavirus for the 18th day in a row.
articles.content:
Latest figures released today by NHS England show that no further coronavirus-related deaths have been recorded at South Tyneside and Sunderland NHS Foundation Trust for the 18th day in a row.
